div.p: P.L.W. drafted the structure of the article, wrote the introductory and summary text, and the section on long-term landscape evolution. N.G. wrote the section on feedbacks between GIA and ice dynamics. M.A.K. wrote the sections on current knowledge of glacial isostasy and outstanding problems. D.A.W. wrote the section on rheology of the solid Earth. All authors commented on the final version of the article.
